actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration (without written report).

official_title: A resolution to pay a gratuity to the First National Bank of Nevada, Las Vegas, Nevada, as guardian of the estate of Patricia A. Morton.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay a gratuity to a specified bank as guardian of the estate of the daughter of a deceased employee of the Senate, such gratuity to be considered inclusive of funeral expenses and all other allowances.

titles.title: A resolution to pay a gratuity to the First National Bank of Nevada, Las Vegas, Nevada, as guardian of the estate of Patricia A. Morton.
